reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: F.a: Community Development Programme in Millosheva

description.narrative: Children are the future of the community and a future of the country. Many Roma children live in conditions of poverty that create barriers to access basic education. Every child has the right to education on the basis of equality of opportunity. Roma chil dren are particularly at risk of being marginalized or discriminated against in the realisation of this right. The Roma community development project has been able to do a research and establish a centre in the Roma community in Prishtina, where those acti vities are going on, such as: homework-clubs twice a day, pre-schooling every day, children?s meeting weekly, ladies meeting weekly and literacy course twice a week. The direct target group are the children of the community. Parents and the youth are indir ect target groups.The programme goal is to contribute towards a better quality of life for the Roma in Kosovo. Purpose is increased potential of the partner to foster a better quality of life for Roma people in Kosovo. The project results in improved acces s to basic education for children and young people from Roma communities, better opportunities for vocational training for adults among the Roma in target group, raised hopes of employment for Roma through job coaching, and more profitable and hygienic rec ycling system for Roma collectors.
